  • Method Details

    • runApplication

      public void runApplication()

    • printMenu

      public void printMenu()
      Prints the menu for the application. A simple print method that gives the user the option of six operations.

    • circleArea

      public double circleArea​(double rad)
      Calculates the area of a circle. The user is prompted to enter the radius of a circle. The radius is passed and used in the calculation of this method. The area of the circle is returned.
      Parameters:
      rad - radius as provided by the user
      Returns:
      circArea the area of a circle

    • rectangleArea

      public double rectangleArea​(double len, double wid)
      Calculates the area of a rectangle. The user is prompted to enter the length and width of a rectangle. These values are passed and used in the calculation. The area of the rectangle is returned
      Parameters:
      len - length of the rectangle
      wid - width of the rectangle
      Returns:
      rectArea the area of the rectangle

    • triangleArea

      public double triangleArea​(double base, double height)
      Calculates the area of a triangle. The base and height of a triangle is provided by the user. These values are used in the calculation 1/2 * base * height. The area of the triangle is returned
      Parameters:
      base - base of the triangle
      height - height of the triangle
      Returns:
      triArea the area of the triangle

    • circleCircumference

      public double circleCircumference​(double rad)
      Calculates the circumference of a circle. The radius is provided by the user. The radius is passed and used in the calculation 2 * pi * radius. The circumference of the circle is returned
      Parameters:
      rad - radius of the circle
      Returns:
      circum the circumference of the circle

    • rectanglePerimeter

      public double rectanglePerimeter​(double len, double wid)
      Calculates the perimeter of a rectangle. The length and width of the rectangle are provided by the user. These values are passed and used in the calculation 2(length) + 2(width); the perimeter of the rectangle is returned
      Parameters:
      len - lenght of the rectangle
      wid - width of the rectangle
      Returns:
      rectPerim the perimter of the rectangle

    • trianglePerimeter

      public double trianglePerimeter​(double s1, double s2, double s3)
      Calculates the perimeter of a triangle. The length of the three sides of the triangle are provided by the user. These values are passed and used in the calculation. The perimeter of the triangle is returned
      Parameters:
      s1 - side 1 of the triangle
      s2 - side 2 of the triangle
      s3 - side 3 of the triangle
      Returns:
      triPerim the perimeter of the triangle
